test.instr: (:ins (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue) (type Y container) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y table))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X red))) (:info (at X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red) (sort Y desk))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave) (type X container))) )
test.nl: Put the blue cup in the microwave. Pick up the red cup. Put the green bottle on the table. The red can is on the desk. The door of microwave is opened.
